name: Survie the ocean
description:
Controls:

==========================

W/A/S/D or arrow keys = Move

Hold Spacebar to search the water for materials

Use the mouse to click on stuff to craft.

Once you get the distillery:

Y  to add water or fish

T to drink water when done

E to eat if fish is avaliable

IMPORTANT!!!

There is a bug im currently working on fixing, if you get an error when you start the game just restart it should work. Reason its not fixed is it's due in 2 hrs.

GOAL

===================================

The Goal of this game is to last as long as possible while avoiding sharks and replenishing your food and water, to do this you need a distillery, get on it!

This is my first game ever released and it was part of the LOWREZ gamejam.

Any questions, feel free to message me, i may have forgotten something in here this is my first time writing one of these. lol

Also please feel free to leave a review, even a negative one! This helps me figure out where i need to improve. (Graphics are not my strong point :P)

Made with GameMaker studio 2

Music by Abundant Music : https://pernyblom.github.io/abundant-music/index.html
